testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.text: Levqor saved us 3 months of development time. We went from prototype to production in 2 weeks. The built-in Stripe integration and email system were game-changers.

testimonials.name: Marcus Rodriguez
testimonials.text: The connector pack is incredible. Gmail, Slack, Notion integration out of the box? Sign me up. We've processed over 500K jobs without a single issue.

testimonials.name: Emily Thompson
testimonials.text: Finally, a backend API that just works. The security is enterprise-grade, the docs are clear, and the API is beautifully designed. Worth every penny.
